p.span: May ISD is a Texas public school district located in unincorporated May, Texas, serving approximately 300 students in Pre-K through 12th grades. Our district is blessed by an extremely supportive community and friendly, caring teachers and staff. We offer an early childhood learning center, small class sizes, and college - and vocation - bound academics in a rural environment.
